price: Ipinagkaloob Namin kay David si Solomon. Kay inam na lingkod! Tunay na siya ay palabalik [kay Allāh].
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيۡمَٰنَۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلۡعَبۡدُ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lidāwūda sulaymāna niʿ'ma al-ʿabdu innahu awwābun
